Cookie Policy

How Jaipur-Thailand uses cookies to enhance your travel booking experience

Last updated: November 12, 2025

Understanding Cookies

At Jaipur-Thailand, we use cookies and similar technologies to provide you with the best possible travel booking experience. This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage your preferences.

What Are Cookies?

Small Text Files

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit websites. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

Enhanced Experience

Cookies make your interactions with Jaipur-Thailand faster, more secure, and personalized to your travel preferences and booking history.

Types of Cookies We Use

Essential Cookies

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off.

Purpose:

  • • Secure login and authentication
  • • Shopping cart functionality
  • • Payment processing security
  • • Website security features

Examples:

  • • Session management
  • • Load balancing
  • • Fraud prevention

Analytics & Performance Cookies

These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

Purpose:

  • • Website traffic analysis
  • • User behavior tracking
  • • Service improvement
  • • Bug identification

Data Collected:

  • • Pages visited
  • • Time spent on site
  • • Error messages
  • • Booking funnel analysis

Preference & Functional Cookies

These cookies remember your preferences and personalize your experience.

Purpose:

  • • Language preferences
  • • Currency selection
  • • Recently viewed tours
  • • Search history

Benefits:

  • • Personalized content
  • • Location-based offers
  • • Faster booking process

Marketing & Targeting Cookies

These cookies are used to deliver relevant advertisements and measure campaign performance.

Purpose:

  • • Personalized travel offers
  • • Retargeting campaigns
  • • Social media integration
  • • Campaign performance

Examples:

  • • Facebook Pixel
  • • Google Analytics
  • • AdWords conversion tracking

Cookie Duration

Session Cookies

Temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser

Persistent Cookies

Remain on your device for set periods (30 days to 2 years)

First-party Cookies

Set by Jaipur-Thailand for our website functionality

Managing Your Cookie Preferences

Browser Settings

You can control cookies through your web browser settings. Most browsers allow you to:

  • • View stored cookies
  • • Delete specific cookies
  • • Block third-party cookies
  • • Clear all cookies on exit
  • • Set cookie preferences
  • • Enable/disable cookies

Third-Party Cookies

Some cookies on our website are set by third-party services we use to enhance your travel booking experience.

Service Providers:

  • • Google Analytics
  • • Facebook Pixel
  • • Payment processors
  • • Social media platforms

Purpose:

  • • Analytics and insights
  • • Social media integration
  • • Payment security
  • • Advertising effectiveness

Updates & Contact

Policy Updates

We may update this Cookie Policy to reflect changes in technology, legislation, or our services. We encourage you to check this page periodically for the latest information.
